chisimba_dbtable_ui_link.title: Build a model (dbtable) class
chisimba_dbtable_ui_link.description: Build a model class derived from a database table for the Chisimba MVC architecture. The dbtable class is named based on the table name, typically db$table and resides in the classes directory of your module. Model classes extend the dbtable framework class and inherit its methods.
